Introduction

Miryo (미료) is a South Korean rapper and songwriter under Mystic Story Entertainment. She is a member of the girl group Brown Eyed Girls and a former member of Honey Family. She made her solo debut on February 1, 2012 with her first mini album Miryo aka Johoney. She also makes videos on YouTube with her channel called Miryo. She is also a producer.
